bookTitle: Summer's Sweet Embrace: A Sweet Romance Anthology
bookAuthors: Kim Strattford, Laurie Treacy, Christa MacDonald, Niki Mitchell, Michelle Ziegler, Jaylee Austin, Sheryl Winters, Melissa J. Crispin
plot: Summertime love is always the sweetest. These eight sweet tales of summer romance are the perfect companion for a day at the lake or the beach. When The Sea Swallows the Sun - Kim StrattfordOcean Dust - Laurie TracyThe Beach Rose - Christa MacDonaldLove's High Tide - Niki MitchellLove's Nectar - Jaylee AustinTruly Paradise - Michelle ZieglerAbove Reproach - Sheryl WintersLinger - Melissa J. Crispin
